app.name: Myrient Search
app.description: A search engine for Myrient - a service by Erista dedicated to video game preservation.
app.tagline: Myrient offers organized and publicly available video game collections, keeping them from becoming lost to time.

search.indexing: Indexing in progress, if the list is missing something please try reloading in a few minutes

about.title: About
about.support: If you like this project, please consider supporting Myrient:

emulator.title: Built-in Emulator
emulator.description: This website includes a built-in emulator powered by EmulatorJS that brings retro gaming directly to your browser.
emulator.compatibility: Compatible games will feature a play button on their search result page.
emulator.browser_tip: For the best gaming experience, use a Chromium-based browser with hardware acceleration turned on.
emulator.save_states: Games are loaded directly from Myrient's public archive. Save states are stored locally in the browser.
emulator.limitations: ROM hacks, soundtracks, and other non-game content are not supported by the emulator and may fail to load.
emulator.disabled: Web Emulator functionality was disabled by the administrator.
emulator.contact: Contact the administrator or spin up your own instance of Myrient Search.

metadata.title: Metadata Information
metadata.description: This website pulls metadata information about games from {{metadata_source}}. Some metadata may be missing or incorrect due to mismatches between ROM name or problems with the service provider.

search_columns.title: Search Columns
search_columns.tooltip: Selects which columns the search engine will search on.

score_multiplier.title: Search Score Multiplier
score_multiplier.tooltip: Multiplies the match score for each word found based on the category it's found in.

fuzzy.label: Fuzzy Value
fuzzy.tooltip: Value between 0.00 and 1.00 that determines the fuzzy distance (Levenshtein distance) for how closely a word needs to be considered a match. A higher value allows for less stringent matches. A value of 0 disables.

prefix.label: Allow Prefixes
prefix.tooltip: Allows partial matches of words at the start of the word.

match_all.label: Match All Words
match_all.tooltip: Requires all words in the search query to match.

hide_non_game.label: Hide Non-Game Content
hide_non_game.tooltip: Filters out ROM hacks, patches, artwork, and other non-game content from search results.

use_old_results.label: Old Search
use_old_results.tooltip: Controls whether your searches direct to the new or old results experience.

error.no_rom: No ROM file found in archive

warning.non_game: Warning: This file may not be a game ROM and might not work properly in the web emulator.
warning.see_about: See the {{link}} page for more information.
warning.https: Insecure HTTP: Some emulators require HTTPS to function properly. This instance isn't properly configured.

console.about: This is an online emulator running game ROMs directly from Myrient's public archive.
console.disclaimer: No game ROMs are hosted on this website. All content is loaded directly from Myrient servers.
console.more_info: For more information about this service, please visit the About page.

emulator.not_available_tooltip: Web emulation is unavailable for this title as it's either not a game or the platform is unsupported.
emulator.disclaimer: This emulator loads games directly from {{link}}. Learn more on the {{about}} page.

welcome.title: AI Assistant
welcome.description: I can help you find retro games, provide gaming recommendations, and answer questions about using the search engine.

suggestions.game_recommendations: What games do you recommend for Nintendo 64?
suggestions.search_tips: How do I search for specific regions?
suggestions.gaming_history: Tell me about retro gaming consoles

error.network: Unable to connect to the AI service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.generic: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.
